anytime:
Your beautiful smile 
brightens my day

The kindness you show 
to everyone is inspiring.

You make a huge difference 
in the lives of those around you
morning:
No matter what you wear, 
you always look fantastic

When I’m not around you, 
I’m thinking about you

I’d rather spend time with you 
than anyone in the world
afternoon:
I’m so glad we belong 
to each other

I can never put into words 
how much you mean to me
I love you more deeply each day
evening:
You put a lot of effort 
into caring for others. 
I appreciate you
I can’t imagine life without you
